title: Za’atar cod with relish
description: Add some spice to cod with the wonderful flavour of za'atar. Serve alongside homemade relish and rice or potatoes.
ingredients: 4 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for frying
400g/14oz prime cod fillet or loin (or a different firm white fish), cut in to 4 pieces
6 preserved lemons, halved and roughly chopped
1 small bunch of coriander, roughly chopped
